page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: Mrs Dale Hollingsworth's farm is at Crays Hill. This mixed farm has a dairy herd and cattle raised for beef.Much of the 500 acres is used for grazing,peas,barley and wheat are grown.The farm employs six workers,two are Youth Training Scheme students.She breeds her Fresian herd using A.I.or her own bull.She is a member of the Rare Breeds Society and keeps an Old English White Bull.Highland and short horn cattle.When her cows become too old she sends them to the abbattoir and she is paid their worth on the hoof.She disapproves of cattle markets.Although this farmer is interested in conservation and prefers the old methods,she uses artifical fertiliserand sprays her crops against pests.She said,"The E.E.C. is a good thing,a strong community working together could help prevent war.
